get.description: Returns a list of configured bookmakers and their IDs.

parameters.name: access_level
parameters.description: The access level of your API key

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description:
2 letter code for supported languages

`en` (English) is the only fully supported language for this API. Click **[here](https://api-docs.sportradar.us/misc/Sportradar_API_Languages.xlsx)** for a tabular list of available languages per competition.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format returned

get.description: Provides scheduling info for all events with props available in a given competition.

parameters.name: access_level
parameters.description: The access level of your API key

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description:
2 letter code for supported languages

`en` (English) is the only fully supported language for this API. Click **[here](https://api-docs.sportradar.us/misc/Sportradar_API_Languages.xlsx)** for a tabular list of available languages per competition.

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: ID of a given competition

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format returned

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Number to start the list of results from. Example: start=0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number to limit the number of results. Minimum and maximum value is 1. Example: limit=1

get.description: Provides scheduling info for all events with props available for a given sport and date.

parameters.name: access_level
parameters.description: The access level of your API key

parameters.name: language_code
parameters.description:
2 letter code for supported languages

`en` (English) is the only fully supported language for this API. Click **[here](https://api-docs.sportradar.us/misc/Sportradar_API_Languages.xlsx)** for a tabular list of available languages per competition.

parameters.name: sport_id
parameters.description: ID of a given competition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format returned

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Number to start the list of results from. Example: start=1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number to limit the number of results. Minimum and maximum value is 1. Example: limit=1

parameters.name: live
parameters.description:
Boolean value to return live/non-live markets

Example: live=true or live=false
